SELECT MLM.LOCATION_CD , ML.LOCATION_NM , MLM.LOCATION_CD||'('||ML.LOCATION_NM||')' AS LOCATION_CD_NM , MLM.USER_NO , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_USER_NAME(MLM.COMPANY_CD, MLM.DIVISION_CD, MLM.USER_NO) FROM DUAL) AS USER_NM , ROWIDTOCHAR(MLM.ROWID) AS KEY_ID , MLM.DIVISION_CD , MLM.DIVISION_CD FROM MOM_LOCATION_MANAGER MLM , MOM_LOCATION ML WHERE MLM.COMPANY_CD = ML.COMPANY_CD(+) AND MLM.DIVISION_CD = ML.DIVISION_CD(+) AND MLM.LOCATION_CD = ML.LOCATION_CD(+) AND MLM.COMPANY_CD = #{companyCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MLM.DIVISION_CD = #{divisionCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MLM.USE_YN = 'Y'
AND MLM.LOCATION_CD = #{locationCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
